text:
Hi Liv,
The anim looks nice! What I'm seeing is that the shot now seems a little bit "empty". If you check it, your character is just moving when she's talking. Actually, the firsts 40 frames is frozen. If you add some little movements, or maybe a context (she could be doing something meanwhile she's talking) that would add more texture and will help you timing :slightly_smiling_face:
Sorry I just realised i put an old playblast on there, this is the right one! that one i sent you was shocking. i redid the whole thing

attachments.text: Review media collaboratively in the cloud - no setup, visual creative feedback, all real time with just a link.

text: i havent really touched the lip sync yet. just the chin movement
